forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush blankets the city, with a modest chill lingering in the air, just above 40 degrees. The forecast promises a transition from the calm of night to the embrace of a sunny day. Though the horizon hints at a vibrant awakening, clarity may be tempered by wisps of coastal fog, delicately clinging to the edges like a shy muse revealing her secrets. For those venturing out in the late morning sun, the temperature will hover comfortably around 62, a pleasant invitation to shed layers but keep a light jacket close by, for the afternoon air is inclined to cool.

With clearer skies emerging, it is the perfect moment to explore the hidden gems of the city. A leisurely stroll through the historic streets may be particularly enchanting, allowing one to savor both fresh coffee and the soft glow of the sun against the architecture. Alternatively, a quiet moment in one of the local parks would be idyllic, as the brisk air lends itself well to contemplation before the day's activities unfold. Embrace the fresh energy of San Francisco as it awakens — a day of simple pleasures awaits in the gentle embrace of the city.
